Texts.Eng:
Place 1 Item in Red Slot to determine Element. Accepts the following:
      ^gray;Venom Sample, Scorched Core, Cryonic Extract, Static Cell, Glass (Keeps Element)
      ^white;Glass can be created using Sand in a Furnace. ^red;Do not use Glass Blocks.^reset;
      ^magenta;Legendary^gray; and ^yellow;Essential^gray; Weapons can not change element: either use Glass or their element's related Item.
Place Electrum Bars in Yellow Slot. Requires ^red;exactly 2^reset; for Upgrades and ^red;exactly 4^reset; for Creation.

To upgrade an existing weapon, place it in the Purple Slot.
      ^gray;Otherwise, to create a new weapon, place an item in the Purple Slot. Accepts the following:^reset;
      Exactly 2 Sharpened Claw (Spear), Exactly 2 Hardened Carapace (Hammer), Exactly 6 Steel Bar (Broadsword),
      ^gray;Exactly 1 Sharpened Claw (Dagger), Exactly 1 Hardened Carapace (Axe), Exactly 3 Steel Bar (Shortsword)
      ^red;More Weapon Types will be introduced at a later date; Mod Weapon Types, like Katanas, will be included as well.

When creating a new weapon, place ^red;3 Coal^reset; in the Blue Slot.
      ^gray;Otherwise, place desired Items in Blue Slot. Accepts the following:
      ^white;Diamond (Increases Base Damage), Battery (Decreases Energy Cost), 3 Coal (No Stat Change)
      ^gray;Some Weapons do not accept these modifications,^red; so try using 3 Coal if your weapon is not being upgraded.^reset;
      ^white;You can only use Diamonds and Batteries once. Batteries can be crafted in a Furnace: ^red;don't use AA Batteries.
